thread.title: Debby Smith
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by Debby Smith

author: Debby Smith
title: Debby Smith
text: After scouring the internet, retail websites, etc., etc., I finally found a place that goes way above and beyond in customer service and their beautiful product! Fine Rug Collection is the source you need to experience if you are in the market for a rug. I was absolutely amazed at the customer care during my phone conversation with Aktar and how meticulously my two rugs were carefully packaged when they arrived on my doorstep. Their pride and care of their rugs is over the moon! My rugs are more gorgeous than I even dreamed! So happy!!
